DataElement.preferredDefinition: Result of the vital signs measurement as originally received or collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to vital sign._A measure of the average kinetic energy of a system of particles. Temperature may be quantified, in the context of thermodynamics, as the potential of one system to transfer thermal energy to another system until both systems reach a state of thermal equilibrium._The outcome of the vital signs assessment.

ReferenceDocuments.name: VSORRES; VSTEST; VSTESTCD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. In addition to the SDTMIG variable VSORRES, create VSTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of VSTEST from VSTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the VSTEST.
